description: The file defines a RecyclerView adapter, MoveHistoryAdapter, for displaying a list of move history entries in a chess application. It includes data class definitions, view holder implementation, and diff callback logic to efficiently update the list.

classes.name: MoveRow
classes.description: Data class representing a row in the move history with move number and SAN notation for white and black moves.

classes.name: MoveHistoryAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of MoveRow objects, with view holder and diff callback logic.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for move item views, holding references to TextViews for move number, white move, and black move.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item view layout and creates a view holder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a MoveRow object to the views in the ViewHolder.
